Everyone had enough raw organic delicious fruit to eat, everyone had enough exercise and fun, just like all of the other Great Apes in Africa do unless human corperations disturb them. We were living as we were evolved. NATO and "civilization" and the police aren't the reason we have some form of federally-approved "freedom" and food, we have it in spite of them. One man's terrorist is another man's freedom fighter. I recommend you watch Russia Today which really does seem to be somewhat honest. But the companies like NATO and the US government are some of the most corrupt of all, because people don't question them as much.

They have the ability to destroy all natural normal foods forever because they will all be infected by the GMOs with how things are looking. There would be no going back from this. I wonder what you might find if you could hack into the files of Monsanto for example and other GMO companies.
